name: Barts-CMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Bart's CMS is a website Content Management System that is build with Codecharge Studio.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Powered by <a style="color:#ccc;" href="http:\/\/trinityhome.org(\/|\/barts_cms\/)"  title="Bart's CMS \[Business Edition\] Version ([\d\.]{1,10}) \[(Stable|Beta)\]" >Bart's CMS<\/a>)
